C

changeMod() - Method in class dkupert.cipher.GUICipherView
This Method is used to change the Cipher mode
changeMode(String, String) - Method in class dkupert.cipher.GUICipherModel
This Method uses the principle of polymorphism to switch the MonoAlphabeticCipher into either the ShiftCipher or the SubstitutionCipher
checkSecretAlphabet(String) - Static method in class dkupert.cipher.MonoAlphabeticCipher
This Method is used to check the secret Alphabet after specific criteria
Cipher - Interface in dkupert.cipher
This interface is used to reserve the method names, which will be used in later classes
CipherException - Exception in dkupert.cipher.Exceptions
This class contains a custom exception which is used in MonoAlphabeticCipher
CipherException() - Constructor for exception dkupert.cipher.Exceptions.CipherException
The default constructor for the new exception
CipherException(String) - Constructor for exception dkupert.cipher.Exceptions.CipherException
